meanings.definition: A right to use someone else's property for a specific purpose.
meanings.sent1: She had an easement to walk through her neighbor's garden to reach the lake.
meanings.sent2: The easement granted allowed the construction of a driveway on the land.
meanings.sent3: The easement to use the community pool made her the envy of the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: His friendship was an easement through the challenges of life.
meanings.sent5: The easement to access the shortcut made her daily commute much easier.
